Constructor Detail

ClientListenerAdapter

public ClientListenerAdapter()
Method Detail

onClientOpen

public boolean onClientOpen(Client client)
Description copied from interface: ClientListener
The client has been accepted or is connecting. This can be used to to tune the socket parameters before it binds to an address. This is invoked in the context of the Pipelines connect method.

Specified by:
onClientOpen in interface ClientListener
Parameters:
client - The client to initialize.

onClientConnect

public void onClientConnect(Client client)
Description copied from interface: ClientListener
The client has successfully connected and is ready reading and writing. This is invoked in the context of the Pipelines connect method or the workers thread if the connect was invoked in non-blocking mode.

Specified by:
onClientConnect in interface ClientListener
Parameters:
client - The client that has connected.

onClientRead

public void onClientRead(Client client)
Description copied from interface: ClientListener
The client is aboue to read from its socket. This can be used to do custom handling of sockets. This is invoked in the context of the Worker thread.

Specified by:
onClientRead in interface ClientListener
Parameters:
client - The client reading.

onClientReceive

public void onClientReceive(Client client,
                            java.lang.Object data)
Description copied from interface: ClientListener
The client has received an object which was decoded from its input. This is invoked in the context of the Worker thread.

Specified by:
onClientReceive in interface ClientListener
Parameters:
client - The client that received the data.
data - The data received by the client.

onClientWrite

public void onClientWrite(Client client)
Description copied from interface: ClientListener
The client is about to write to its socket. This can be used to do custom handling of sockets. This is invoked in the context of the Worker thread.

Specified by:
onClientWrite in interface ClientListener
Parameters:
client - The client writing.

onClientSend

public void onClientSend(Client client,
                         java.lang.Object data)
Description copied from interface: ClientListener
The client has sent an object - encoded it to its output and will send it soon. This is invoked in the context of the Worker thread.

Specified by:
onClientSend in interface ClientListener
Parameters:
client - The client that sent the data.
data - The data sent by the client.

onClientDiscard

public void onClientDiscard(Client client,
                            java.lang.Object data)
Description copied from interface: ClientListener
The client has attempted to send an object that does not have a matching protocol in the clients pipeline to properly encode the data. This is invoked in the context of the Worker thread.

Specified by:
onClientDiscard in interface ClientListener
Parameters:
client - The client thats discarding the data.
data - The data that could not be encoded.

onClientError

public void onClientError(Client client,
                          java.lang.Exception e)
Description copied from interface: ClientListener
An error has occurred with the client, this can be thrown from any of the above events.

Specified by:
onClientError in interface ClientListener
Parameters:
client - The client that threw the exception.
e - The excpetion thrown by performing some action on the client.

onClientDisconnect

public void onClientDisconnect(Client client)
Description copied from interface: ClientListener
The client has been requested to disconnect. When disconnecting the client will refuse any more data to send and will not read from the socket. Once all output has been flushed the client closes. This is invoked in the context of the invoking thread.

Specified by:
onClientDisconnect in interface ClientListener
Parameters:
client - The client being disconnected.

onClientClose

public void onClientClose(Client client)
Description copied from interface: ClientListener
The client has been closed. This may happen manually, from disconnecting, or because an error was thrown and had to close the client. This is invoked in the context of the invoking thread or if the client is disconnecting its in the context of the Worker thread.

Specified by:
onClientClose in interface ClientListener
Parameters:
client - The client that was closed.
